snippet.title: Prisma | Latin American Games Showcase TGA 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Prisma
Prisma is a captivating 2D Japanese-inspired RPG featuring innovative turn-based combat with never before seen strategic use of camera lens and filters. Your camera empowers you to manipulate the world through lenses and filters, turning battles into a mesmerizing interplay of strategy and artistry.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo/ここで購入:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2850910/Prisma/
